description:
IKVM.NET is a cross-compiler and a runtime that enables unmodified Java JARs to run on the .NET platform (including Mono).

This package includes the following tools:

* `ikvm`: The runtime itself. Similar to the `java` executable, this tool runs JARs or raw class files using the Common Language Runtime through IKVM.NET.
* `ikvmc`: This executable compiles class files or JARs into a EXE or DLL usable on the .NET platform, without requiring that the JRE be installed.
* `ikvmstub`
summary: IKVM.NET is a runtime that runs Java JARs on the .NET platform.
author: Jeroen Frijters
